name: Toastin'
description:
a toaster simulation for Buddy Up Jam Spring 2022

current version: 1.0.1

select bagel or bread slice

press down or "s" to start toastin'

press up or "w" to stop toastin'

try again until you know how long each kind of order takes and hire toastmates to increase your income

big thanks to @cloutsocks for testing

bagel jam 2k22

download the faces used in this game here
